mapper.select: SELECT * FROM movie_review_comment where mov_rev_num = #{mov_rev_num} and mov_rev_com_num > 0 order by mov_rev_com_num asc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.amount};
mapper.update: UPDATE movie_review_comment set mov_rev_com_good = (mov_rev_com_good)+1 where mov_rev_com_num=#{mov_rev_com_num}
UPDATE movie_review_comment set mov_rev_com_good = (mov_rev_com_good)-1 where mov_rev_com_num=#{mov_rev_com_num}
UPDATE movie_review_comment set mov_rev_com_bad = (mov_rev_com_bad)+1 where mov_rev_com_num=#{mov_rev_com_num}
UPDATE movie_review_comment set mov_rev_com_bad = (mov_rev_com_bad)-1 where mov_rev_com_num=#{mov_rev_com_num}
mapper.select: SELECT mov_rev_com_good AS good, mov_rev_com_bad AS bad FROM movie_review_comment WHERE mov_rev_com_num = #{mov_rev_com_num}
SELECT mov_rev_com_num FROM movie_review_comment WHERE mov_rev_num = #{mov_rev_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie_review_comment(mov_rev_com_content, mov_rev_com_regdate, mov_rev_com_good, mov_rev_com_bad, mem_num,mem_nickname, mov_rev_num) VALUES (#{mov_rev_com_content},now(),0,0,#{mem_num},#{mem_nickname},#{mov_rev_num})
